entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the evening then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
